game.shortDescription: Cyberemo 2007: “Wake up damn you, Emo, we have a lot of veins for cuts!” Old-school platformer breathtaking game.

reviewHighlights.text: Cyberemo 2007, developed and published by Siberian Mouse, is a deliberately strange, lo-fi first-person experience that leans heavily into surrealism,...
